name: Physics Drop Complete
description:
A draw me physic game. Draw colorful lines & let the cube drop into the cup.

Do you enjoy brain games? Want to play a unique line physic game? If you do, you should definitely try Line Drawing Physic Drop game now. This is ultimate line physic game for everyone! Draw line and make the cube drop into the cup. It is a very exciting brain game that challenges you to draw line accurately because the cube drops according to the law of physic.
There are various brain games out there, but to find a true challenging game is not easy. We keep innovating and creating unique games that will sharpen your brain and let you have fun at the same time. This time, we come up with a unique line physic game unlike any others.

~~~ BEST FEATURES OF LINE DRAWING PHYSIC DROP ~~~

• Simple rule: draw line (and sometimes colorful lines) to guide the movement of the cube
• Make the cube drops into the cup
• 45 challenging levels
• Realistic movement that follow the law of physics
• Ability to unlock next level even before you’ve finished the last level.
• Hours of addictive and exciting gaming.

How to play Line Drawing Physic Drop game:
1. Touch and draw to draw colorful lines to guide the cube to drop into the bowl, bypassing as many stars as possible.
2. The length of the lines and the types of lines you can draw are different for each level.
3. Each line represent different types of movement:
- Red means the cube will move upward
- Green means the cube will bounce on top of it
- Black means the cube will slide down
4. Touch Play button to start moving the cube.
5. If you’ve made a mistake, touch the Replay button to replay the level.
So, draw me now! Play our line physic game, have fun, and sharpen your brain in this thrilling brain game challenge!
